name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
coverImage: A group of hobbits and their companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring.

name: French Kiss
description: A woman flying to France to confront her straying fianc√© gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her to smuggle a stolen diamond necklace.
coverImage: A woman meets a charming man on a plane to Paris.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker sentenced to life in prison for the murder of his wife and her lover builds a new life for himself over the course of two decades, befriending a fellow prisoner and finding hope in the most unlikely of places.
coverImage: A man stands looking out at the Shawshank State Penitentiary.

name: Life of Pi
description: A young boy stranded on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger must find a way to survive.
coverImage: A young boy sits on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger.
